description: This move is crucial for advance Akuma gameplay. First of all, this is the common Kara-Demon move, also this is the move that you can become unthrowable by normal grabs, also Gigas Breaker (even caught from behind).

Motion: During F, D, DF+K press P
During F, D, DF+K press K
During F, D, DF+K press LP+LK
